title: A couple versions of Windows are no longer supported after today
content:
Microsoft makes a ton of products and services, and every time it introduces a new one, it publishes a promised end-of-life date. Almost all of those dates fall on the second Tuesday of the month, and this month, there are a couple of versions of Windows 10 that are reaching the end of the line.

The post A couple versions of Windows are no longer supported after today appeared first on XDA.
description: A couple versions of Windows 10 are getting their last update. Version 1909 for businesses and 20H2 for consumers are no longer supported.
